tourName: Xishuangbanna wildlife and culture tour, China
generalInfo:
Immerse yourself in the tropical frontier of Southwest China on this 7-day "Mystical Xishuangbanna" adventure. This journey blends adrenaline-fueled rainforest treks with spiritual rituals, set against the backdrop of the Mekong River. You will walk high above the canopy, track wild Asian elephants in their natural habitat, and experience the vibrant traditions of the Dai and Jinuo ethnic minorities.

Why choose this holiday? Wildlife & Conservation: Visit the Wild Elephant Valley, the only place in China where you can safely observe wild Asian elephants. We focus on observation and conservation education rather than performance, respecting these majestic creatures in their natural home.

Jungle Adventure: Challenge yourself on the "Sky Tree" Canopy Walk at Wangtianshu, suspended 36 meters above the ground. Later, embark on an authentic jungle trek in Jinuo Mountain, learning survival skills and herbal wisdom from the Jinuo people, the last officially recognized ethnic group in China.

Cultural Immersion: Participate in the daily "Water Splashing Festival" at the Dai Ethnic Garden, a joyous ritual symbolizing purification and blessing. Wander through the dazzling Gaozhuang Starlight Night Market, a sensory feast of Dai snacks, floating lanterns, and local crafts.

Botany & Biodiversity: Explore the world-renowned Xishuangbanna Tropical Botanical Garden to see rare "strangler figs" and the giant King Lotus, understanding why this region is crowned the "Kingdom of Plants."

dayInfo.description: ARRIVAL IN JINGHONG. Welcome to the tropical Xishuangbanna. Airport pick-up and free time to explore the night markets.
WILD ELEPHANT VALLEY & ANCIENT TOWNS. Observe wild Asian elephants in their natural habitat and support conservation efforts. Evening visit to the Gaozhuang Night Market.
SKY-HIGH RAINFOREST ADVENTURE. Full day at Wangtianshu National Park. Walk the 500m Canopy Walkway suspended between giant trees.
JUNGLE TREK & INDIGENOUS CULTURE. Hike through the rainforests of Jinuo Mountain. Learn traditional hunting and gathering tools from local guides and enjoy a rainforest lunch.
BOTANICAL WONDERS & WATER FESTIVALS. Visit the Xishuangbanna Tropical Botanical Garden. Afternoon immersion in the Dai Ethnic Garden to join the Water Splashing rituals.
SACRED PEAKS & UNDERWATER WORLDS. Morning visit to Xishuangbanna Primeval Forest Park to see the peacocks. Afternoon exploration of the Mekong River Underwater World and Manting Park.
FAREWELL. Last-minute shopping for Pu'er tea or wood carvings before your airport transfer.
